Avoid crowds, stay safe and shop from the comfort of your home. With Jumia, you open your doors to savings and convenience!
Shop safely and conveniently online with Jumia, the largest online retailer in Africa.

So what exactly do you get with the Jumia app? 

- Daily exclusive app only Flash sales on top products
- Special Treasure hunts with guaranteed prizes
- Faster access to deals
- Exclusive app-only discounts
- Fast and Free shipping in select cities across Africa!
- Exclusive app only vouchers

With the Jumia App, shop safe and convenient online!

Download the Jumia Online Shopping App today for the best shopping experience in Africa. Great discounts, hassle free payment options, easy returns and 100% genuine items guaranteed!

From fashion to electronics, find anything you need on Africa’s largest online shopping store. Enjoy a large selection of international and local brands to choose from and shop 100% genuine products only at Jumia! 

Payment made easy with secure payment options such as cash on delivery, mobile money or pay using your credit card with our secure payment system Jumia Pay.

So you ask, what can I shop at Jumia? 
We sell millions of products, download the app and search what you are looking for. Some top items include:

- Mobile Phones & Tablets
- Laptops, Notebooks, Desktops and accessories
- Appliances, TVs, Games, Consoles, Home Theatres 
- Sporting Goods, Lifestyle products
- Fashion for all - Men, Woman, Kids & Babies
- Baby Necessities - Diapers, Skincare, Toys and all
- Health & Beauty Products - Make up, perfumes, Hair care, Oral care & more
- Home & Living - Furniture, Decor, Bedding, Kitchen Essentials
- Grocery Items & Supplies - Yes you read that right

With the Jumia Shopping App, you get:
- Customized shopping experience with a personalized feed
- Buyer protection 
- Cross-platform shopping, whether on a smartphone, a tablet or even on a desktop, Jumia app will keep all the products on your cart as long as you are logged in to your account.
- Order management from our call center, our call center will call you to inform about the status of your order
- International shopping experience from brands like  Apple, Canon, HP, Pampers, Moulinex, L’Oreal, Samsung, Tefal and many more!

Operating in more than 11 markets in Africa, the Jumia Online Shopping Application is available in Arabic, English and French. Our in-house customer service strives hard to provide you with impeccable service to all your questions in English, French, Arabic or the respective regional languages of the countries.

We always look forward to provide the best customer experience,  share your feedback with us to help us achieve that goal.

** DISCLAIMER **
We have been informed that our app is fraudulently advertised by third-party advertisers, mostly in the form of fake vouchers or offers. These ads are published without our consent and we highly regret and condemn this behavior.

If you encounter any of these issues, please help us and copy the page URL found and report it to jumia.online.shopping@jumia.com with subject "Fraudulent Ad" so that we can take the ad down.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Discover a New Level of Convenience with Hubtel!​
Hubtel is your one-stop app for fast and reliable delivery, seamless payments, and essential services—all tailored for a soft life in Ghana.​
​
What You Can Do with Hubtel:​
​
Fast & Reliable Delivery​
Order Food, groceries, and essentials from local favorites and get them delivered to your doorstep in no time!​
​
Send Money, Hassle-Free​
Transfer money instantly across all networks and banks using MoMo wallets like MTN Mobile Money, AirtelTigo, and Telecel Cash.​
​
Pay Bills, Stress-Free​
Take care of everyday bills like ECG, Ghana Water, DSTV, and more—directly from the app.​
​
Insure Your Car Instantly​
Skip the queues and buy your car insurance sticker in just a few taps.​
​
Buy Now, Pay Small Small​
Buy what you need now and pay later in easy weekly installments.​
​
Find Some of Your Favorite Local Shops and Restaurants​
Some of our shops and food  delivery partners include: Melcom, KFC, Pizzaman Chickenman, Papaye, RocoMamas​
​
More than Just Delivery​
Hubtel lets you order food and groceries, send money, pay bills, and even buy your car insurance sticker—all in one app!​
​
Why Hubtel?​
Hubtel is more than just a delivery app; it’s your essential partner for daily life in Ghana. We combine fast and reliable delivery with secure payments and a host of convenient services, making your life easier and more efficient.​
​
Download Hubtel today and experience a new level of convenience! ​

Discover trendy outfits, dresses, jeans and affordable clothing with fast shipping and 1000+ new arrivals weekly. Our online shopping app brings stylish women's, curve, men's and kids’ fashion to your fingertips as the #1 most-searched fashion brand.

-----
WHY FASHION NOVA IS YOUR STYLE ESSENTIAL
-----

• 1000+ NEW ARRIVALS WEEKLY: Be the first to rock the latest trends and new clothes before anyone else. Our design team brings you trendy outfits inspired by runway looks.
• INCLUSIVE SIZING: Perfect fits for every body type with our Women's, Plus Size, Curve, Men's, and Kids collections. Our trendy clothing is designed to flatter all bodies.
• CELEBRITY-APPROVED STYLES: Worn and loved by today's biggest stars. Our trendy outfits have been featured in music videos, red carpet events, and social media posts.
• UNBEATABLE PRICES: Runway-inspired fashion at discount prices that won't break the bank. We deliver boutique-quality clothing at affordable prices.
• LIGHTNING-FAST SHIPPING: Get your must-have pieces delivered quickly to your door. Shop new clothes and have them arrive in time for the weekend.
• EASY RETURNS: Hassle-free 30-day return process to ensure your complete satisfaction with every purchase of our stylish clothes.

-----
APP FEATURES THAT ELEVATE YOUR ONLINE SHOPPING
-----

• PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS: Discover stylish clothes curated just for you based on your browsing history and preferences.
• EASY CHECKOUT: Save your details for one-tap purchasing, making buying trendy clothing faster than ever.
• EXCLUSIVE APP-ONLY DEALS: Access special discounts and flash sales first, before they're available anywhere else.
• WISH LIST: Save your favorites to shop later. Keep track of those must-have trendy pieces you want.
• ORDER TRACKING: Monitor your package from warehouse to doorstep with real-time updates on your trendy outfits.
• REAL-TIME NOTIFICATIONS: Get instant alerts on new arrivals, restocks, and exclusive flash sales.
• SECURE PAYMENT OPTIONS: Shop with confidence using multiple payment methods including installment plans.

-----
DISCOVER OUR TRENDING COLLECTIONS
-----

• FASHION NOVA: Contemporary women's styles from casual to boutique quality. From basics to statement pieces, our women's collection offers trendy outfits for every occasion.
• FASHION NOVA CURVE: Stunning plus-size fashion that celebrates every curve with stylish options. Our plus size collection features trendy clothing cut to fit.
• FASHION NOVA MEN: Streetwear and casual essentials for the modern man who appreciates quality and style. Our men's collection offers trendy outfits for day to night.
• FASHION NOVA KIDS: Miniature versions of our hottest adult styles for fashion-forward young ones.

-----
FIND YOUR PERFECT STYLE
-----

• Our app makes finding your perfect look effortless. Whether you're searching for that sexy statement piece, curve-hugging jeans, or casual streetwear, we've got you covered.
• The Fashion Nova shopping experience is designed with you in mind. Our intuitive search filters help you find the perfect trendy outfits by size, color, price, or occasion.
• Join our global community of Fashion Nova Babes! Tag @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, and #NovaBabe for a chance to be featured on our social platforms.
• Gentlemen, elevate your wardrobe with Fashion Nova Men! Tag @FashionNovaMEN and #NovaMen to showcase your streetwear style.

CONNECT WITH US:

• Instagram: @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, @FashionNovaMEN
• TikTok: @FashionNova
• X: @FashionNova
• Facebook: @FashionNova
• Snapchat: @FashionNova

Download the Fashion Nova app now and experience why we're the fastest-growing online boutique worldwide. Shop our trendy clothing collection today—your next head-turning outfit is just a tap away!

app_name: 拼多多 - 多多买菜，百亿补贴
developer: Shanghai Xunmeng Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
拼多多——多实惠，多乐趣

拼多多，社交新电商，更懂消费者的手机购物APP。8亿用户在此拼团，享受更高性价比的生活。和你的家人、朋友、邻居一起拼，品质商品更低价，包邮送到家，分享实惠，分享乐趣。

-多多买菜
1、依托拼多多全新的农产品上行物流体系，一键直达全国超过1000个农产品产区。
2、从田间到餐桌，避免中间环节损耗，百亿补贴加专项补贴，买菜更划算。
3、手机变成菜篮子，精选全国及海外农产区产地优质好货，覆盖各类生活必需品。
4、足不出户为家庭轻松选购次日生鲜，拿起手机选购，带着蔬果回家。

-更懂生活，好货不必贵
1、品类丰富：覆盖全品类品牌商品。小百货9.9包邮，轻松提升日常幸福感，品牌商品更低价，助你完成美好生活梦想。
2、百亿补贴：精选补贴全网热销品牌商品，直接降价，购物不必做算术题。
3、产地好货：源头好货产地直达，从农田到餐桌，从车间到小区，中国制造四十年产业经验为你敞开。
4、正品保障：假一赔十，品牌商品正品险，海关全程监督。

-分享乐趣，购物不孤单
1、发现好物，与好友共同分享，体验发现低价好货的乐趣。
2、和志同道合的好友拼单，或参与万人团，与8亿拼多多用户一起拼。拼团享受更低价，组团购物不孤单。
3、和朋友玩转小游戏。好朋友，就要一起栽种，一起收获。
4、为好友呈现你的真实点评，为真朋友说出真体验。

-产地直播，商家陪你看海
1、看数百万真实商家产地直播。看红薯从地里挖出，看菠萝的海，看一双鞋如何从生产线走到你面前。
2、市县长代言各产业带好货。市长县长精选本地产业带尖货，化身拼多多主播为你在线答疑。

-多多视频，有趣内容刷不停
1、魔法视频、超多滤镜、新奇特效、一键跟拍，出大片如此简单！
2、生活妙招、搞笑视频、美食菜谱、精彩直播，想看的这里都有！
3、高清画质、全屏沉浸、海量视频、智能推荐，多实惠更多乐趣！

因为倾听，所以更懂你

Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

Feel free to customize this description to align with the specific features, benefits, and tone of your multivendor ecommerce app. Highlight what makes your app unique and why users should choose it for their online shopping needs

NaijaCP: Your Trusted Platform for Digital Purchases & Bills Payment

NaijaCP is the go-to app for gamers and anyone looking to conveniently pay for utilities and digital products. We offer a wide range of affordable in-game currencies and easy solutions for paying bills like airtime, data, electricity (IKEDC, PHCN, prepaid), and cable TV subscriptions (DSTV, GOTV). Whether you need Call of Duty Mobile CP or want to stay on top of your utility bills, NaijaCP delivers a fast, secure, and affordable experience.

Key Features


1. Wide Range of Products and Payment Options

NaijaCP offers a broad selection of services:

Call of Duty Mobile CP: Buy CP to unlock premium in-game items like skins and weapons.


PUBG Coins: Get UC to access exclusive game items in PUBG.


iTunes Gift Cards: Purchase apps, games, music, and more from the Apple Store.


Bills Payment: Pay electricity bills (IKEDC, PHCN, prepaid), cable TV subscriptions (DSTV, GOTV), and more with ease.


Airtime and Data Bundles: Instantly top up your mobile with airtime or purchase data for major networks in Nigeria.


Cable TV: Quickly settle your DSTV and GOTV subscriptions for uninterrupted viewing.


No more juggling multiple apps. NaijaCP consolidates all these services into one platform for your convenience.

2. Competitive Pricing and Exclusive Offers

NaijaCP provides competitive pricing on all products, ensuring you get the best value. We also offer exclusive deals, flash sales, and limited-time discounts. Check the app regularly to enjoy these promotions and save even more on your purchases.

3. Instant and Secure Transactions

All transactions on NaijaCP are processed instantly. Whether you’re purchasing game currencies or paying bills, you get immediate confirmation and access to your purchases. Plus, we prioritize security—using advanced encryption to protect your financial and personal information during every transaction.

4. Multiple Payment Methods

NaijaCP supports a variety of payment methods, including credit and debit cards, mobile payments, and local bank transfers. Choose the most convenient option for you, whether you’re buying digital goods or paying for services.

5. Easy-to-Use Interface

Our clean and user-friendly interface makes navigating NaijaCP simple. Whether you’re buying game currencies or managing your bill payments, everything is streamlined for a seamless experience. With delivery available all over Lebanon, enjoy swift shipping in as little as 3-5 days. Permissions Notice
 Please note that the Ishtari app may require access to certain services to function optimally:
 Camera: Enables the app to utilize your device's camera for product scanning, capturing images, or scanning barcodes.
 Location: Allows access to your location for discovering local offers and expedited address selection.
 Storage: Grants permission to store preferences for faster loading times and enhanced user experience.
 Wi-Fi: Utilized during setup of features such as Dash Button or Dash Wand for convenient shopping.
 Download the Ishtari App on the App Store today to elevate your online shopping experience.

developer: Shenzhen Buming Electronic Commerce Co. LTD
description:
About TospinoMall
TospinoMall is an localized integrated shopping mall focusing on emerging markets in Africa, equipping with such online functions as product searching, browsing, collection, buying, payment, order inquiry, logistics tracking and return/exchange. By convenient cross-border direct mail, it converges huge global good products to meet people’s needs on daily consumption and online shopping, bringing consumers an easy, happy shopping experience.

[Comprehensive Product Categories]
You can buy everything you want on the TospinoMall app!
Apparel, Beauty, Digital, Office, Maternity & Baby, Building, Home, Auto, Medical, Fitness, Agric, Lighting, and Chemical & Metallurgy.
Go and download the TospinoMall app! You will get everything you want!

[Easier Login & Shopping Experience]
Available for Email/Google/facebook Account directly log in,also one-click to share your shopping recommendation to facebook.Share your shopping experience with family or friends.

[Timely Delivery & Easy Access]
Fulfillment by Tospino Express (FBT)
Local warehouses and teams get goods ready in 24 hours and send them out within 72 hours. It takes only 1-3 days to send the goods to the shipping address.
Fullfillment by Merchants (FBM)
Massive selections from overseas,surprising packages for you within fastest 7-14 days' shipping.

[Promotion & Discount]
TospinoMall’s members can enjoy various special offers and benefits, such as good coupons for large orders, free gifts for higher consumption points, great discounts on holidays or festivals, exclusive birthday gifts and 1GHS flash deals.

[Worry-free After-sales Services]
TospinoMall provides the Return/Exchange services for products with damages or quality problems. 
It supports the Return/Exchange services within 7 days after the consumption. Some products can even be returned/exchanged within 365 days after the consumption if the products are till saleable for maintaining their good quality.

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons.

Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

The Made-in-China.com App is a world leading wholesale mobile B2B marketplace for global trade. Buy products from quality Chinese suppliers all from your mobile device conveniently. 

3 STEPS to complete your transaction:
Search Products > Place Orders > Trade Safely

Shop What You Need
We provide safe and reliable online trading services. All transaction processes can be completed in our app. You can place an order and track your order anytime, anywhere.

Easy Sourcing
Source millions of new and innovative products from Verified Suppliers. 40,000,000 products from 27 categories are all for your purchase requirements. Now you can easily select and compare products.

Get Multiple Quotations
Post customized sourcing requests, you will receive price quotes in 24 hours. 
6,000,000 suppliers gathered here are trade agents, wholesalers, retailers, manufacturers and SMEs, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada and so on.

Keep in Touch
Send inquiries to get latest factory discounts or sample requests. Chat directly with suppliers by TradeMessenger system. You can make a voice call or video call to verify the supplier.  

Brand New Smart Expo
Hold various online exhibitions that simultaneous with major trade fairs from all over the world. No matter where you are, you can efficiently browse the virtual booths and start face-to-face online meetings with exhibitors at once.

Member Events
Organize diverse forms of member events on a regular basis. Semi-monthly live video streaming, celebration activities during festivals, events that open to everyone...... All is waiting for you!

Languages & Currencies Supported
The Made-in-China.com supports 16 popular languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Italian, German, Dutch, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian. And 18 local currencies are now available.

Moreover
Get most relevant recommendations based on your sourcing preferences.
Share products and suppliers on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.
“Featured” channel helps you find trustworthy suppliers and high-quality products.

The Made-in-China.com App, a must-have app in global B2B trade!
DOWNLOAD NOW AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS!
